text: It has been the honor of my life to serve Vermont. We were the first state in the country to outlaw slavery and the first state legislature to vote to legalize same-sex marriage. Vermont has led the struggle for human freedom and justice – and we will continue to do so. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1132346399880691712 QT @BernieSanders I'm back in Vermont for the first rally of our 2020 campaign in my home state. Past negotiations with #MaduroRegime failed because they used them to divide the opposition & gain time.

I hope #OsloTalks can help make progress towards the return of democracy to #Venezuela. But any election conducted with  #Maduro in power will not be a free & fair one.

Almost one-third of transgender Americans already lack regular access to health care. This decision would make things worse. We will fight this. 
https://twitter.com/nprpolitics/status/1131961816010153985 QT @nprpolitics The Department of Health and Human Services is proposing to roll back protections for transgender people in health care by removing gender identity from the classes protected from discrimination. https://trib.al/9FV1JR9

Notice the people willing to explain this away, yet when Ilhan’s words are taken out of context, they are the 1st to jump on her.

Look at how these accusations are selectively enforced on the left, esp when it’s the *alt-right* actually committing antisemitic violence in the US.

Earlier this week I reintroduced my Maternal CARE Act to combat the maternal mortality crisis facing Black women.
 
Because what’s good for our Black mothers is good for our babies, families, and communities—and it’s good for the entire country.

Incarcerated Americans shouldn’t have to pay to talk to the people they love. I stand with the activists in Connecticut who are working to make prison calls free. https://theintercept.com/2019/04/02/connecticut-free-prison-calls/

Ever since the Bush Admin, Patriot Act, & creation of Dept. Homeland Security, the dangerous erosion of American civil liberties has worsened.

We’re melting away our Constitutional rights - all for the excuse of hating immigrants.

We’re shredding what it means to be American.⬇️ https://twitter.com/nateabaurrea/status/1132113040151760896 QT @NateAbaurrea I got ambushed and interrogated by CBP today, on my way IN TO Mexico. 5 officers (waiting on the walkway just before entrance into MX) stopped me and ordered me to step in a little side cage area. I asked why I was being stopped. I was told to be quiet and turn around. (Thread)

Anyone who understands the history of American foreign policy knows that, over the years, many of our wars and military interventions were based on lies and deceptions coming from the White House. I make no apologies for protesting the war in Vietnam.

I make no apologies for helping to lead the opposition to the war in Iraq.

I make no apologies for passing a resolution to end the Saudi-led war in Yemen.

And I make no apologies for trying to stop a war with Iran. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1132380550285676545/img/iVxKHy4lk7YD6Ts4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1132380550285676545/vid/320x180/Q_wGsr5Gd-ncxDKN.mp4?tag=12

Selling more weapons to Saudi Arabia doesn't make America safer or align with our country's values. It only benefits defense contractors and @realDonaldTrump's alarming desire to sow chaos abroad. l'll do everything I can in Congress to stop it.

HUD is proposing a new rule that would threaten immigrant families with eviction and could displace tens of thousands of children — many American citizens — from their homes.
 
This administration's cruel, anti-immigrant agenda knows no bounds. HUD must withdraw this proposal.

RT @rashadrobinson Black women face the highest infant mortality rates in the US -- making them even more susceptible to criminalization for miscarriage and stillbirth. We can't afford to let incarceration be another reason to avoid seeking medical care. https://twitter.com/ColorOfChange/status/1131224820157435905 QT @ColorOfChange Abortion bans put pregnant people's lives at risk. We know Black women, trans & gender-nonconforming folks are particularly vulnerable & disproportionately criminalized. DAs have the power to refuse to enforce abortion bans. Here’s a startling statistic: Nearly one out of every five teachers in America stops teaching after five years. This hurts our kids. Teachers deserve our support. That’s why I introduced a plan to raise teacher's pay an average of $13,500 a year.

No corporate PACs. No federal lobbyists. You are the core of our campaign. Every dollar matters to ensure we can meet as many voters as possible. Pitch in today.

The fight for #UniversalChildCare is personal for me. Back when I was a mom with two little kids, finding high-quality, affordable child care was make-it-or-break-it. If we could find over a trillion dollars to bail out Wall Street, we can damn well afford to protect the pensions of Americans. If I am elected president, I will impose an immediate moratorium on any future pension cuts and I will reverse the pension cuts that have been approved. https://twitter.com/jamieson/status/1132329894216704001 QT @jamieson There’s a strong chance in a few years we’ll see retired miners and truckers getting pennies on the dollar for their pensions. If the PBGC’s program goes under as projected, the same could happen to a million+. A legit crisis hardly anyone talks about: https://www.huffpost.com/entry/a-million-people-could-lose-their-pensions-without-help-from-congress_n_5ce5be5fe4b0547bd131edbd

Those at the top are thriving, while the middle-class is barely scraping by. One of the first things I’d do as president is reverse Trump’s tax scam and use that money to give the middle class a real tax cut. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/24/business/highest-paid-ceos-2018.html
